}

I had to change the code a bit so that I wouldn’t get errors when compiling. I also added public int[] equipment = new int[14];
to player.java so that the p.equipment[1] has a symbol or is declared.

It complies with no errors but when I log on and click the skillcape emote… nothing happens I don’t get “You need to be wearing a skillcape in order to perform this emote” and if I wear a skillcape and click it nothing happens still.

Any help or suggestions? Or maybe a whole new working code for skillcapes?(that will work with Pali’s NIO)
I think the public int[] equipment = new int[14]; is not correct or I need to add something else… I’m not sure but
Please help this is really bugging me lol
